work-item.field:
If we want to reuse the previous exercise so other members of our team can use them aswell we should create a macro with imput parameter.
  •  Create a macro familylist and add parameter $familymember
    • Insert previous exercise into your macro
    • Replace your list of family names and set $family=$familymember
  • Call macro familylist 2 times with different family members
Example Image:
